quotes: If you think about it, `bb || !bb` always returns true.
SirSatanII: *I am not a command. Please try again later.*
Jdalt40: I'm expecting an Easter egg of me 9 AM tomorrow sharp
How to mod RimWorld: Copy and paste stuff, get angry at stuff, make other people angry at your stuff.
If IE is brave enough to ask you to set it as your default browser, don't tell me you dare not ask a girl out.
Namsan: I like to drink tears and bloods
Sneaks: How dare you, what did that poor Wolfy ever do to you
Xen: How dare you even vaguely praise IE
How many consonants are there in the answer to this question?
If 666 is evil, does that make 25.8069758011 the root of all evil?

quote.description: Pulls up a quote from a database.

parameters.option: The quote option. Can be a number or the word 'random'. Default is 'random'.

mbhelp.description: Displays the help for a command.

parameters.command: The command. Can be left blank.

xpath.description: Tests the core xml files using a set xpath. Returns the first 5 matches. Can have spaces.

parameters.path: The XPath path to be tested.

wikisearch.description: Searches the wiki for the specified search term.

wshopsearch.description: Searches the steam workshop for the specified search term.

parameters.queryType: The search type. Can be one of: `relevance`, `top`, `recent`, `mostsubscribed`. If unrecognised or left blank, will default to `relevance`.

iteminfo.description: Brings up the stats for any building/item/projectile.

parameters.item: The item's name. Can be the def name, label or part of the label. Case insensitive.
